subject: Greetings to you
body:
Greetings to you
I Mr Eric Smith wrote from a hospital where there was bladder cancer,
and I also failed surgery because of the high risk of cancer. I am a
I am a 75-year-old widower and I am no longer married. In addition, the
latest medical examination shows that I will not live for more than
three months. My country is (Brazil) but I live in the United States of
America. So, I made contact with you so that you could be the
beneficiary of the money I inherited from my ex-wife. Depending on
your agreement, I will credit you with the bank management and ask
them to pay you the sum of $3.5Million Dollars into your bank account
immediately.
Also, 
I want you to get back to me with your full details
 on this email: 
accttgeneral378@gmail.com
1. Full Name:
2. Address:
3. Country:
4. Phone Number:
5. Occupation:
6. Age:
Yours truly
Mr Eric Smith
Email: 
accttgeneral378@gmail.com

subject: Re: Greetings to you
body:
Hello Mr. Eric Smith,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition. It must be a tough time for you. I appreciate your trust in me, but I'm just an ordinary person and I don't know how much help I can be.

Could you please tell me more about this inheritance? How did you come across my contact information? And why did you choose me for this task?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jarrod

subject: Re: Greetings to you
body: Get back to me with your informations

subject: Re: Greetings to you
body:
Hello there! I'm interested in hearing more about what you have to share. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

Best wishes,
Jarrod
